price: 37. Woo saaku ummaan num keenik ise duddu haa caagidiy edde agxita le.
arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ شَأۡنٞ يُغۡنِيهِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: likulli im'ri-in min'hum yawma-idhin shanun yugh'nīhi
